title: Giant-Size Punch-Thing #1
description:
Giant-Size Punch-Thing #1 is a free parody comic based on characters from the online PC game Marvel Heroes.

The game allows you to play as a number of different Marvel super heroes including Cyclops.
I wondered how effective Cyclops would be with a pure melee build. IE not using ANY of his optical powers at all!

Much to my surprise he turned out to be surprisingly effective. That trained punch is very powerful indeed and thus the legend of Punchclops was born!

After creating The Adventures of Punchclops as a webcomic available at http://www.punchclops.eyehunger.com/ I eventually got the urge to create a full comicbook sized special issue.

And here it is!
